title: Toy Bank: "Bank Building"
medium: watercolor, gouache, and graphite on paper
dimensions:
overall: 20.2 x 27.8 cm (7 15/16 x 10 15/16 in.)
Original IAD Object: 4 3/16" long at base; 2" wide; Base to top of dome: 4 1/8"; Entrance: 1 13/16" wide; 2 1/2" high; dome 1 3/8"; 1st story: 1" high; 7/16" wide; 2nd story 13/16" high; 12/16" wide
